an4.191:1.1: “Sotānugatānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ, vacasā paricitānaṃ, manasānupekkhitānaṃ, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ cattāro ānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā.
an4.191:1.4: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.191:1.5: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:1.6: So muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumāno aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an4.191:1.9: atha so satto khippaṃyeva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:1.10: Sotānugatānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ, vacasā paricitānaṃ, manasānupekkhitānaṃ, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo ānisaṃso pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.191:2.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.191:2.2: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.191:2.3: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:2.4: So muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumāno aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an4.191:2.5: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapadā plavanti;
an4.191:2.6: api ca kho bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
an4.191:2.8: ‘ayaṃ vā so dhammavinayo, yatthāhaṃ pubbe brahmacariyaṃ acarin’ti.
an4.191:2.10: atha so satto khippameva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:2.13: Tassa na heva kho assa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā:
an4.191:2.14: ‘bherisaddo nu kho, na nu kho bherisaddo’ti.
an4.191:2.16: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.191:2.17: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.191:2.18: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:2.19: So muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumāno aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an4.191:2.20: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapadā plavanti;
an4.191:2.21: api ca kho bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
an4.191:2.23: ‘ayaṃ vā so dhammavinayo, yatthāhaṃ pubbe brahmacariyaṃ acarin’ti.
an4.191:2.25: atha so satto khippaṃyeva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:2.26: Sotānugatānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ, vacasā paricitānaṃ, manasānupekkhitānaṃ, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo ānisaṃso pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.191:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.191:3.2: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.191:3.3: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:3.4: So muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumāno aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an4.191:3.5: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapadā plavanti, napi bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti;
an4.191:3.6: api ca kho devaputto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
an4.191:3.8: ‘ayaṃ vā so dhammavinayo, yatthāhaṃ pubbe brahmacariyaṃ acarin’ti.
an4.191:3.10: atha so satto khippaṃyeva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:3.13: Tassa na heva kho assa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā:
an4.191:3.14: ‘saṅkhasaddo nu kho, na nu kho saṅkhasaddo’ti.
an4.191:3.16: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.191:3.17: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.191:3.18: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:3.19: So muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumāno aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an4.191:3.20: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapadā plavanti, napi bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti;
an4.191:3.21: api ca kho devaputto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
an4.191:3.23: ‘ayaṃ vā so dhammavinayo, yatthāhaṃ pubbe brahmacariyaṃ acarin’ti.
an4.191:3.25: atha so satto khippaṃyeva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:3.26: Sotānugatānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ, vacasā paricitānaṃ, manasānupekkhitānaṃ, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ ayaṃ tatiyo ānisaṃso pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.191:4.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.191:4.2: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.191:4.3: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:4.4: So muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumāno aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an4.191:4.5: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapadā plavanti, napi bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti, napi devaputto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti;
an4.191:4.6: api ca kho opapātiko opapātikaṃ sāreti:
an4.191:4.7: ‘sarasi tvaṃ, mārisa, sarasi tvaṃ, mārisa, yattha mayaṃ pubbe brahmacariyaṃ acarimhā’ti.
an4.191:4.11: atha so satto khippaṃyeva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:4.14: Añño pana sahāyako sahāyakaṃ evaṃ vadeyya:
an4.191:4.18: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.191:4.19: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.191:4.20: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:4.21: So muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumāno aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an4.191:4.22: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapadā plavanti, napi bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti, napi devaputto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti;
an4.191:4.23: api ca kho opapātiko opapātikaṃ sāreti:
an4.191:4.24: ‘sarasi tvaṃ, mārisa, sarasi tvaṃ, mārisa, yattha mayaṃ pubbe brahmacariyaṃ acarimhā’ti.
an4.191:4.28: atha kho so satto khippaṃyeva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:4.29: Sotānugatānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ, vacasā paricitānaṃ, manasānupekkhitānaṃ, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ ayaṃ catuttho ānisaṃso pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.191:4.30: Sotānugatānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ, vacasā paricitānaṃ, manasānupekkhitānaṃ diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ ime cattāro ānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
